job description:
Do you have a customer analytics and marketing background and are looking to leverage that and join a fast-growing company and team? We are working with a analytics company looking for candidates that have some sort of customer analytics or market experience to join their downtown Chicago office.

They are looking for a data scientist with 2+ years of professional experience working in the marketing / consumer analytics space. The ideal candidate will have experience model building with Python and R , as well as having some sort of experience with ML and predictive analytics. Any Spark or Hadoop experience is a huge plus as well. Their team is small, but growing, and they are looking for an individual that enjoys working in a collaborative environment who has strong communication skills.

In this role, youll be working heavily hands on, but also having a chance to lead and mentor some of the more junior scientists on their small Chicago team of 3. This position offers a lot of upward mobility and growth as the team continues to grow in this high-demand industry.
  • 2+ years professional data science experience in the marketing / consumer analytics space
  • Professional ML / predictive analytics experience
  • Experience with relational databases
  • Collaborative, team-based approach to data science
  • Experience with streaming tools such as Spark and Hadoop
  • Cloud exposure
  • Masters of PhD in Physics, Math, Stats, or related field
    • Tech Breakdown
  • 100% Analytics 50% Reporting / 50% Predictive
  • 50% Python / R
  • 25% SQL
  • 25% Spark / Hadoop
    • Daily Responsibilities
  • 75% Hands On
  • 25% Lead
  • Total compensation up to 120k
  • Generous PTO
  • Growth potential and yearly raises
    • You will receive the following benefits:
  • Medical Insurance & Health Savings Account (HSA)
  • 401(k)
  • Paid Sick Time Leave
  • Pre-tax Commuter Benefit
    • Applicants must be currently authorized to work in United States on a full-time basis now and in the future.

    This position does not offer sponsorship.
